mapper.insert: insert into tb_user values( default, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, default, now(), now(), now(), now() )

insert into tb_user_optional_info values( default, #{userId}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, default, #{marketingReceiveAgreement}, #{thirdPartyInfoSharingAgreement}, #{useConditionAgreement} )
insert into tb_user_role_met values( default, #{roleUserId}, #{roleId}, now(), now() )
insert into tb_login_history values( default, #{loginUserId}, now(), #{loginIp} )
mapper.update: update tb_user set last_login_date = now() where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.username, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.last_login_date, u.created_date, urm.user_role_met_id, urm.role_user_id, urm.role_id, ur.role_id, ur.role_name, ur.role_img, uoi.user_id, uoi.user_option_id, uoi.birth_date, uoi.gender, uoi.phone_number, uoi.address, uoi.profile_img, uoi.marketing_receive_agreement, uoi.third_party_info_sharing_agreement, uoi.use_condition_agreement from tb_user u left outer join tb_user_role_met urm on(u.user_id = urm.role_user_id) left outer join tb_user_role ur on(urm.role_id = ur.role_id) left outer join tb_user_optional_info uoi on(uoi.user_id = u.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}
